data.Name: Stan Or Itchy
data.Bio: Female fronted Ska Stan Or Itchy demonstrates on its debut EP „Russian Cow“ that Swiss ska is still alive and more creative than ever! The eight-headed combo merges traditional ska with elements from pop and rock and makes the off-beat accessible to a bigger audience. These versatile musical influences are bundled into catchy tunes by the angel-like voice of the frontwoman. Before releasing their debut, the band already placed a song on the famous international sampler series “Skannibal Party” of the German label Mad Butcher Records. Read more on Last.fm
